attributes.action: Provide more grants to young people to help start businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am currently trying to start my own business, and struggling to get a grant to start it, as i am under 18. 

I am sure other young people are currently or have had the same problems. So therefore, we call on the Prime minster to provide more grants to help people who are in our position.
